column4: I want to put a small minimal windows installation onto a separate partition on this computer.  What I'm wondering is.. could I possibly use an installation CD that was made for another computer on this computer?  I'm thinking that CD will install video drivers and everything for that other comp.. would I still be able to at least use it so I can install the proper drivers, will this work at all??
you will need either a retail or oem copy
if that disk says anything about the manufacturer of the laptop on it, I would bet a dollar to a donut against it working
ya, I think it says "toshiba" on it
